mapper.sql: select func_id, func_name, parent_id, order_num, url, func_type, visible, perms, icon, create_by, create_time from sys_func
mapper.select: select distinct m.func_id, m.parent_id, m.func_name, m.url, m.perms , m.func_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time from sys_func m left join sys_role_func rm on m.func_id = rm.func_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role ro on ur.role_id = ro.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and m.func_type in ('M', 'C') and m.visible = 0 AND ro.status = 0 order by m.order_num

select distinct m.func_id, m.parent_id, m.func_name, m.url, m.perms , m.func_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time from sys_func m where m.func_type in ('M', 'C') and m.visible = 0 order by m.order_num
select distinct m.perms from sys_func m left join sys_role_func rm on m.func_id = rm.func_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId}
select concat(m.func_id, m.perms) as perms from sys_func m left join sys_role_func rm on m.func_id = rm.func_id where rm.role_id = #{roleId} order by m.parent_id, m.order_num
mapper.delete: delete from sys_func where func_id = #{funcId} or parent_id = #{funcId}
mapper.select: SELECT t.func_id, t.parent_id, t.func_name, t.order_num, t.url, t.func_type, t.visible, t.perms, t.icon, t.remark, (SELECT func_name FROM sys_func WHERE func_id = t.parent_id) parent_name FROM sys_func t where t.func_id = #{funcId}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_func( func_id, parent_id, func_name, order_num, url, func_type, visible, perms, icon, remark, create_by, create_time )values( #{funcId}, #{parentId}, #{funcName}, #{orderNum}, #{url}, #{funcType}, #{visible}, #{perms}, #{icon}, #{remark}, #{createBy}, sysdate() )
